headline.main: IRAN GETS WEALTH OF ABDICATED SHAH; Son Also Prepares Amnesty for All Political Prisoners of His Father's Reign

lead_paragraph: TEHERAN, Iran, Sept. 18 (AP) -- Iran's new Shah has decided to cede all the possessions of his fabulously rich father as a gift to the nation, the government announced today.
abstract: Allies sending Germans in Iran to India, Australia and Siberia

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
